About Practice Sessions

Practice sessions are hands-on coding workshops designed to reinforce the concepts covered in lectures. Each session includes:

  • Interactive Examples: Step-by-step coding demonstrations
  • Exercises: Practical problems to solve during the session
  • Code Reviews: Discussion of best practices and common pitfalls
  • Q&A: Time for questions and clarifications
